desc: Material Needs small business haberdashery and wool shop in Bunrham-on-Sea high street Somerset TA8 1PE and website. Quality sewing, knitting, crochet, cross-stitch, and craft equipment for sale.

layout.text: The Largest Range Of Yarn In The South West
We're proud to keep a massive range of colours, blends, and brands of yarn in store to suit every crafter's needs.
